title: S2 E40: Six Minutes with the Lost Boys…and Girls
description:
Adam introduces Holiday to the wonders of the island and the many amazing creatures who live there. Meanwhile, WhittierCorp launches an attack on the Anders family. 
Become a Six Minutes Superfan today! Get episodes a week early, ad free, and scripts for every episode. Show your support for the show by signing up at Patreon. https://www.patreon.com/sixminutespodcast
Six Minutes is produced by Gen-Z Media. For more great Gen-Z shows visit http://bestrobotever.com or follow us on Twitter and Facebook and Instagram.

See Privacy Policy at https://art19.com/privacy and California Privacy Notice at https://art19.com/privacy#do-not-sell-my-info.
